item.title: #en @ 1461503888234717186
item.description:
For the first time in history one can access all* the CA #waterrights #waterdata data from eWRIMS in the form of 17 flat files published as #machinereadable #OpenData resources. @MaestuRafael & team spent 4+ years on this! Huge.
https://t.co/MxFxQUaKXP https://t.co/3V4tNd74Ia

item.title: #en @ 1461461088072089614
item.description:
I can't say this enough:
NYC has such a wealth of research and information we were able to build on & #opendata we could analyze - its amazing!
I think the level of detail in #StateoftheUrbanForestNYC would be tough, if not impossible to include for most other cities https://t.co/LHjjX4UPft

item.title: #en @ 1461444830672818180
item.description:
As was said months ago. For some reason we continue to build delays in data metrics here in #Germany.
#Corona data, open data, vaccinations, child vaccinations, hospital data, registered deaths.
Political? Technological? Ideological? Either way, no way to deal with disasters. https://t.co/ONQm2k2vby

item.title: #en @ 1461411032425906178
item.description:
Interested in detailed #opendata elevation information for #bcfloods? See the #LidarBC - Open #LiDAR Data Portal. DEM, DSM, and point clouds. 1:2500 scale. #laser #bcflood2021 #bcflooding #openaccess
Background on data and download ğŸ”—: https://t.co/TAa4uEC2Ep https://t.co/ouq2aFH37x
